i am also having problems with activation if i moved the license files why am i still being asked to enter a purchase code?

for those having trouble installing:

during installation, DO NOT select Activate. Select activate later and finish installing. Now go to Program Files > Maple 16. Put the license.dat file from the torrent in the license folder for Maple 16. Then, replace the maple.dll in C:Program filesMaple 16bin.X86_64_WINDOWS with the maple.dll from the torrent. Now when you start Maple, it should work fine. :)
